message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your budget, the product's value is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
